actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 113 of title 18, United States Code, to prohibit certain acts concerning stolen radio equipment in interstate commerce.

summary.text: Prohibits the knowing transport, receipt, or sale of stolen radio equipment used or operated in the citizens radio service in interstate or foreign commerce. Subjects violators to a fine of not more than $5,000, imprisonment for not more than one year, or both. (Adds 18 U.S.C. 2319)

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 113 of title 18, United States Code, to prohibit certain acts concerning stolen radio equipment in interstate commerce.
